column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Never will I ever forget the first time my third grade class went on a field trip .
#id=2
#text=That was the first day I ever took a bus other than a school bus .
#id=3
#text=We had to get our permission slips signed and bring in $ 2.00 for a bus pass .
#id=4
#text=When I first held my bus pass I wondered why people did n't just pay with cash .
#id=5
#text=The day finally came for us to go to the museum and we walked together as a class to the bus stop .
#id=6
#text=We stood there waiting for about ten minutes for the bus to come .
#id=7
#text=When it arrived people rushed off and we boarded one by one .
#id=8
#text=We each swiped our bus pass and searched for a seat .
#id=9
#text=There were some people who took up two seats and the aroma of breath lingered in the air .
#text=Each stop a bell rang letting the driver know passengers wanted to get off .
#text=It took us ten stop to get to the museum but it seemed like forever .
#text=My teacher pressed the button and we all ran to the museum doors happy to be free .
